name: Beyond the Gate (prsas, alexytow, dartikus, rp1930)
name_original: Beyond the Gate (prsas, alexytow, dartikus, rp1930)
description:
The Horrors on the other side are trying to open a Gate. If they do, it's the end.

You must finish an occult ritual to close the portal before they can cross over, but time is limited - perhaps an offering of flesh may distract them for long enough...
